title: UFC on ESPN+ 19 weigh-in faceoffs video highlights, photo gallery in Tampa
text:
TAMPA, Fla. – UFC on ESPN+ 19 official fighter weigh-ins took place on Friday, and MMA Junkie was on the scene for the proceedings.

The weigh-ins and subsequent faceoffs went down at the host hotel in Tampa, Fla. Saturday’s event takes place at Amalie Arena, and the entire card streams on ESPN+.

In the main event, strawweight contenders Joanna Jedrzejczyk (15-3 MMA, 9-3 UFC) and Michelle Waterson (17-6 MMA, 5-2 UFC) are set to clash in a key matchup for the weight class.

The headliners, along with everyone on the card, were on weight.

Watch the main event faceoff in the video above. And don’t miss our exclusive photo gallery below.
description: UFC Tampa headliners Joanna Jedrzejczyk and Michelle Waterson were among those to make weight for Saturday's card.
